Docs.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter for a blob listing operation.
Docs.value: The delimiter to use to traverse the virtual hierarchy of blobs.
Docs.remarks: The delimiter parameter enables the caller to traverse the blob namespace by using a user-configured delimiter. Using this parameter, it is possible to traverse a virtual hierarchy of blobs as though it were a file system.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::WindowsAzure::Storage::Blob::BlobListingDetails Details { Microsoft::WindowsAzure::Storage::Blob::BlobListingDetails get(); void set(Microsoft::WindowsAzure::Storage::Blob::BlobListingDetails value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the details for the listing operation, which indicates the types of data to include in the response.
Docs.value: The details to include in the listing operation.
Docs.remarks: The include parameter specifies that the response should include one or more of the following subsets: snapshots, metadata, uncommitted blobs.
